alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Randolph (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 03 at 8:58PM CDT until May 05 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Arkansas... Spring River At Imboden affecting Randolph and Lawrence Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Spring River At Imboden. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Lower lying cultivated farmlands and pastures flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 18.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Tuesday evening. Then continue falling into mid week. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecast 7 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Crest Time Date Spring River Imboden 18.0 18.2 Tue 7 PM 11.3 7.8 7.4 FALLING &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
